note.p: Birth: 17 Upper East Smithfield, London, England (10 April 1837)
Death: His home at Lewisham, London (23 May 1904)
Career: Collected botanical samples on a voyage to Australia and China (1855); took up entomology
Memberships: FLS (1862); Societe Imperiale des Amis des Sciences Naturelles de Moscou; New Zealand Institute (Honorary);
Society pro Fauna et Flora Fennica; Entomological Society of the Netherlands
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 367-370 signed by E S
